examples: The ball rolled across the field.
A bola rolou através do campo.

suggested: Why did the chicken cross the playground? To get to the other slide.
I miss my friend who lives across the country. It's hard to stay connected when we're so far apart.
I can't believe how dangerous it is to cross the street in this city. The drivers are so reckless!
Did you know that the shortest distance across the Atlantic Ocean is actually closer to Newfoundland, Canada than it is to Ireland?
The salty smell of the ocean as you stand on the beach and look across the water.
The feeling of the wind in your hair as you ride a bicycle across a wide-open space.
Crossing a bridge can be a powerful metaphor for overcoming challenges in life. We may face obstacles, but we can find a way to cross them and reach the other side.
